Title: Dry, windy conditions reported in southeast Colorado
Summary: It has been very dry and windy in Kiowa, Bent, and Prowers counties in southeast Colorado.
Places: Colorado, Bent County, CO, Kiowa County, CO, Prowers County, CO

Title: Without rain, producer will start feeding hay to cattle  in August in Weld County, Colorado
Summary: We have a small herd of cattle on 320 acres.  Because of the severe drought, we will be bringing them home the first of August, unless there is significant rainfall.  That means we will be feeding hay 8 months of the year instead of the usual 4 or 5 months.From a producer in Carr, Colorado, on June 28, 2012

Title: Spring crops being dusted in, prevented planting requests occurring in Bent, Kiowa, and Prowers counties in Colorado
Summary: Effective precipitation has been well below normal.  Wheat crop is stressing severely.  Grass growth has stopped since May 15.  Spring crops are being dusted in and prevented plant requests are being made.
Categories: Agriculture, Business & Industry, Fire, Plants & Wildlife, Society & Public Health, Tourism & Recreation, Water Supply & Quality
Places: Colorado, Bent County, CO, Kiowa County, CO, Prowers County, CO
